inn1.comm: tight line right away. Fullish and outside off with a hint of away movement, Rahane dabs it towards point off the face of the bat
good length and weaves away outside off, Rahane gets forward and lets it pass. Nice TV-friendly carry for Panyangara
lovely outswinger outside off on a length. Ignored
Panyangara drags Rahane forward with another seductive outswinger outside off. Rahane inches forward, has a nibble. Beaten soundly
and again... Pitched up in the channel and moves away. Rahane is leaden-footed as he wafts and misses
Panyangara starts with a maiden. Back of a length, lifting delivery, holds its line outside off. Easy leave for Rahane.
good length and angling away around off, Vijay presses forward and blunts it in front of the covers
veering onto the pads, Vijay can't connect with a flick. They take a leg-bye
Vitori slides another one down leg, Rahane does not flick it away this time. Wide called
nice and full outside off, keeps going away with the angle. Rahane reaches out for a drive and skews it past the slip cordon to deep third man off a thick outside edge
pitched up and outside off, Rahane gets forward and pushes it in the gap at the covers after opening the face for a couple
even fuller and outside off, driven wide of backward point towards third man
good length and on off, Vijay pats it defensively to the covers
big appeal for leg before, not given. Good length, Panyangara brings this one back in, pinged above the knee-roll of the front pad. It would have trampolined over the stumps
away-swinging ball outside off, poked to third man off a thick edge
good length, probing line on off. Vijay yanks his bottom hand off the bat as he defends it to the covers
back of a length and climbs outside off with extra bounce. Vijay watches it carefully and shoulders arms
pitched up and on a fourth-stump line, lures Vijay into a forward-defensive push to mid-off
Vijay opens the face of his bat on impact with this fullish offering outside off and guides it to third man with soft hands
back of a length and tantalisingly close to the off stump. Tight leave from Vijay

Vitori strikes.. Good length and in the channel outside off. Vijay is ordinarily good at leaving balls but he can't resist his temptation here. He pushes away from the body and edges it to Sibanda at second slip. Not a happy return to ODIs for Vijay
real warm-up ball. Picked away off the pads fine on the leg side
full and slanting away outside off, Rayudu watches it through to Mutumbami
full and pushed across off again, left alone
shortish and goes away with the angle outside off with some extra zip and bounce. Rayudu does not want any of it
pitched up and on off, Rahane gets forward and taps it to the covers
good length and comes in on off, Rahane seeks to clip it to the leg side, but ends up getting a leading edge wide of the covers. He calls for one and Rayudu reciprocates
fullish and darts back in on off, Rayudu does not account for the inward movement and manages an inner edge, which wanders behind square on the leg side
good length and swinging away wide outside off, ignored
much fuller and nips back in on off, gingerly defended back to the bowler
bumpy short ball wide outside off, easy leave for Rayudu

Has Rahane nicked off? Vitori celebrates but it has been muted by the umpire, who suggests that there was no tickle on it. Good length and curling away outside off, Rahane pokes. The ball brushed the thigh on its way to Mutumbami
good length ball on and around off, Rahane answers with a forward defence
probes away on the off-stump, another forward defence
good length and weaves away outside off with the angle. Rahane is on the walk as he pushes feebly and watches the ball zip past the outside edge
Vitori overpitches this, Rahane leans forward, presents a full face of the bat and drives it crisply past Rayudu
very full again, the line is on off, Rahane strides forward and pushes it to mid-off
back of a length and zipping away outside off with loads of extra bounce. Rayudu is drawn into a loose waft and is beaten
good length and comes in, poked out to the right of gully. Raza swoops down on the ball and prevents the possibility of a single
back of a length and outside off, Rayudu does not bother with it
pitched up and attacking the off stump, Rayudu's straight-bat push to the covers intervemes
wide line outside off, no shot offered
a bit too straight in line, Rayudu looks to drive but ends up closing his bat face, playing past midwicket
impressive running between the wickets. Rahane drops this angled back-of-a-length ball in front of the covers and sets off
Vitori overpitches this one, Rayudu gets forward and unfurls a punchy drive to the left of a diving Creamer at mid-on
back of a length and angling away outside off, left alone
lifting shortish ball on a leg-stump line, stops on the batsman. I guess Vitori pulled some pace off it. Poked awkwardly to the leg side
shortish and skids on middle, blocked back to the bowler
dug in short and slides away with the angle outside off. Rayudu lets it pass
too full and outside off, Rahane strides forward and drives it to deep point
pitched up and comes in on off, quick push-and-run single to mid-off. The fielder didn't quick attack the ball. Does not throw the stumps down at the non-strikers' end either
back of a length and outside off, Rahane watches it through to Mutumbami
Panyangara strays in length as he ventures too full. Rahane eases forward and caresses it through the covers, beats deep point's chase t his right
dug in short and rises outside off with alarming extra bounce. Rahane comes forward and then leaves it
back of a length and outside off, dabbed through the covers, this time for one
fullish and curls in on middle, Rahane slithers across and drops it to the leg side
on a good length and just a shade outside off, Rahane presses forward and defends it to the covers
fullish and nibbles in on off, Rahane gets forward and slices it to point with an open face
banged in short and darts in to strike Rahane around the mid-riff area. Rahane was targeting the leg side but missed the flick
Rahane strides forward and dabs this full ball to the covers
good length and swinging away outside off, diffused to the covers
back of a length and hurries on middle and leg, he jabs his bat down hurriedly and fends it to the leg side
dug in short and outside off, left alone
beau-t-i-f-u-l. A tad overpitched and swings away outside off, Rayudu transfers his weight on the front foot and creams it through the covers
short ball zips through outside off, ignored. Superb carry to the keeper. Panyangara collapses in his followthrough. Not the something fishy celebration from the World Cup
fullish and outside off, ignored
disciplined line and length. Good length, blocked on the off stump
Rahane shimmies down the track, Tiripano pulls his length back. Turned to leg for one
good length and just a shade outside off, Rayudu ventures back and defends it
beaten emphatically. Full and leaves Rayudu in the channel outside off. He wafts and misses
run-out chance and they go upstairs. Back of a length and outside off, punched behind point to deep third man. They take on Vitori's arm. Rayudu is in by the time Mutumbami flicks the bails off
another example of urgent running between the wickets. Good length and on off, Rayudu camps back and dabs it in front of the covers for a speedy one
good length and on off, draws Rahane forward. Poked out towards point
starts off with a back-of-a-length delivery outside off, Rayudu hangs back and punches it towards point
good length and straightens a touch on off, Rayudu comes forward and defends it in front of point
short and outside off, Rayudu stays back, rides the bounce as he steers it deftly to deep third man
good length and on off, Rahane tips forward and runs it down to third man
back of a length and swings in late outside off, Rayudu shoulders arms
Rayudu ventures down the track, Chibhabha drags his length back and gets it to move away. Rayudu swishes but can't connect
Rahane strides forward and taps this full ball from outside off to mid-off
back of a length and wide outside off, Rahane aims for a cut and is beaten by the extra bounce

precise placement and equally good timing. Rahane shimmies down the track and punchily drives it in the gap between the covers and point. Tiripano was smart to pull his length back but only came second
fractionally short and outside off, punched to the covers. The fielder flings to his left and stops the ball
Rahane feigns to step out, Tiripano slips in a lifting short ball on a leg-stump line. Helped to long leg with a pull
length and outside off, steered past lone slip to third man. Rayudu waited on it before opening the face of the bat and playing with soft hands
back of a length and holds its line outside off, Rayudu watches it through to the keeper
back of a length and cuts back in from outside off. Rayudu camps back and may have managed an inside edge onto the pad
dug in short and outside off, Rayudu gets on top of the bounce and rides it to deep point
fullish and on off, forward defence from Rahane
good length and swerves back in, poked to the leg side off an inside edge
Chibhabha pulls his length back outside off, punchily defended to the covers
good length and plugs away outside off, ignored
Rayudu nips down the track and slashes this short, wide ball to backward point, where Williams fumbles and gifts a single
full ball on off, solidly blocked back to the bowler
back of a length and outside off, punchily defended to the covers from the crease
keeps it shortish and outside off, Rahane plays another punchy stroke and finds point
incoming ball, but errs too full and straight. Rahane twirls his wrists and flicks it to the right of mid-on. Outruns the chasing fielder
back of a length and tests Rayudu outside off with some away swing. He spars at it before belatedly withdrawing his bat
good length ball, Chibhabha sustains the swing. Rayudu is squared up a bit as he pokes it to the off side
Rayudu flits down the track, Chibhabha pulls his length back smartly and cuts this away outside off. Beaten
shortish and outside off, sits up to be hit. Rayudu shapes for a pull but drags it to midwicket off the inside half of the bat
keeps it short and outside off, Rayudu keeps back and steers it to deep third man
too full and straight, tails in a touch. Flicked around the corner for a couple
superb strike. Beautiful straight bat and pristine timing. Too full and on the stumps, Rahane eases forward and drives it between the bowler and Rayudu

sharp take from Masakadza at slip. On a length and outside off, Rahane is undone by extra bounce. Rahane chases as he aims to run it towards third man. He only manages a thick edge, which is snaffled by Masakadza, moving to his right and pouching it around chest height
shortish and outside off, left alone
back of a length and outside off, punchily defended to the covers
incoming delivery which is glanced behind square on the leg side
good length and straight in line, dropped in front of midwicket
sliding down leg, Mutumbami flings to his left but is beaten. Five wides

Chibhabha roars an appeal for caught behind. Innocuous back of a length ball that pitched on the leg stump and drifts further down. Rayudu does not connect with the glance. Pops back to Mutumbami off the thigh pad. Good call from umpire Tiffin
chops this back-of-a-length back to the covers as he does not get hold of the attempted cut
fullish and on middle, bunted in front of midwicket
pitched up and weaves away outside off, Tiwary goes chasing for it as the ball passes the outside edge
good length ball, blocked back to the bowler
wide line outside off, Tiwary tightens his technique and shoulders arms
full and swerves in on middle, blocked to the leg side
inducker, Rayudu drives it to the right of mid-on, despite some inward movement. The length was a teeny bit full
drags his length back, semi-pulled and semi-flicked to the right of mid-on
pitched up and on off, Tiwary strides forward and pushes it to the covers
dropped short and outside off, Tiwary leans back and chops it to the covers
veering onto the pads, tucked to long leg
pitched up and outside off, driven straight to mid-off
another big appeal for caught behind, not given. Nice and full on off and swerves away ever so slightly, past the hanging bat. No feet movement from Tiwary
back of a length and outside off, play and a miss again

Chibhabha gets Tiwary, umpire Tiffin's finger goes up. Reward for probing bowling. Pitched up, smacks Tiwary on the front pad bang in front of middle. Again, Tiwary did not move his feet much as he attempted a defensive push. This would have rattled the leg stump
good length and on middle, Uthappa slinks across the off stump and taps it defensively to the leg side
pitched up and on off with some away movement, Uthappa is drawn forward into a defensive push to the covers
pitched up and slides away with the angle outside off, no shot offered
drifting onto the pads, Rayudu wristily flicks it behind the square leg umpire. Panyangara runs across from fine leg, slides and keeps it to three

a direct hit at the non-strikers' end and Uthappa is in trouble. They go to the TV umpire. Uthappa has to go, he bags a duck. He drops this full ball near short cover and calls for a risky single. Raza sprints to his right, swoops down on the ball and under-arm flicks it onto the furniture. Two wickets in two overs and India slip to 77 for 4
half-volley outside off, dispatched. Rayudu strides forward and creams it in the gap between the covers and mid-off
pitched up on off, down the track and driven to mid-off
back of a length and on off, Rayudu goes on the back foot to keep it out
fullish and outside off, Jadhav lunges forward and drives it to mid-off
tight line on off, Rayudu replies with a forward defence
straight ball on middle, nudged to square leg
too full and straight, clipped to square leg again
full and on middle, Jadhav inches forward and pats it to mid-on
Second maiden for Chibhabha. Good length and outside off, left alone. Mutumbami does not collect the ball cleanly
legbreak outside off, flat, punched through the covers from the crease
pushed through and turning away outside off. Jadhav waits on it and back-cuts it to the third-man boundary, beating backward point. Jadhav gets off the mark with a four after playing out a maiden
slides on outside off, chopped to backward point
Cremer gives this more air, blocked
straight roller on off, knocked to the covers
loopy and spinning away, dabbed to the right of short cover
short and outside off, Jadhav gets a bottom edge on the cut, drops in front of the keeper's feet

edged and Chibhabha has his second scalp. He is pleased as punch. Back of a length and outside off (not all that short), Jadhav is crease-bound as he aims to cut it away. However, he does not connect properly and nicks it behind. Umpire Tiffin raises his finger again; India are rattled
good length ball, blocked
picked away off the pads to square leg
fuller length and on off, dabbed to the off side
back of a length and on middle, Rayudu keeps back and turns it to midwicket
overpitched and outside off, charming drive through the covers. Vitori mops up in the deep
flighted and on off, Rayudu bends forward and smothers it
back of a length and turning away, punched to deep cover
loopy on off, Binny comes forward and pushes it gingerly to the covers
slid through and turning away, cut firmly to backward point. Williams makes a diving save
fullish and on middle, milked to long-on
nice, minimalist stroke. Too full and on off, mere push to the left of mid-on, skips away to the boundary
leg-stump ball, ducks back in, glanced to long leg
short and on middle, worked to square leg
back of a length and nips away off the seam, leaving Binny prodding and missing
good length and around off, poked to the covers
on a length and outside off, driven to the covers. Cremer dives and makes a half-save, limiting it to one
tossed up legbreak outside off, tapped past the covers
full and dips in on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
floated up outside off, sliced drive to backward point off the outer half of the bat
pitched up and on off, driven straight to short cover
quicker and turns away, guided to backward point off the back foot
flighted on middle, flicked single to long-on
fuller and on middle, Rayudu flicks it neatly to deep square leg for a fifty
good length and on middle, forward and across to defend it in front of mid-on
good length and ducks back in on off, Binny wants to drive but gets an inside edge that wanders away to leg
veering down leg, helped through backward square leg

french cut to long leg. Back of a length and swerves in from outside off, he goes on the back foot and seeks to punch it through the covers. The fielder at long leg throws himself to the right and keeps it to two
banged in short and outside off, dabbed to the right of slip
low full toss on off, driven smoothly to long-off
slides on with the arm on off, kept out from the crease
full and on middle and leg, down the track, does not meet the pitch of the ball as he chips it to mid-on. Rayudu was halfway down for a single but is sent back. Binny was guilty of ball watching
pushed back to the bowler
another low full toss around off, punched down to long-off
on a length and on middle, goes back and works a single in front of midwicket
dug in short and on middle, the extra bounce messes up with Rayudu's attempted flick as the ball drops onto the leg side, adjacent to the pitch
leg-side wide as Chibhabha strays in line
length ball swerves away outside off, left alone
back of a length and on off, blocked back to the bowler
rising ball outside off, diffused in front of the covers
short of a length, top-of-off line with extra bounce. Rayudu goes back and quells it in front of point
tight line and on off, Rayudu aims to defend and manages an inside edge onto the pad to foil the lbw appeal
short and wide outside off, slapped straight to backward point
slower through the air on off, patted to point
skids on after pitching, pushed to mid-off
down the track, manufactures a full ball and hacks it to the right of midwicket
floated up on off,  Binny secures a quick single to point
full and on middle, Rayudu treks down the track and plays a whippy drive to long-on
arm-ball down the leg side, pulled away behind square on the leg side. Just a single
worked in front of square leg for one
rank long hop on middle, Rayudu pummels it. He rocks back and pulls it powerfully over midwicket
picked away off the pads behind square leg
half-tracker on middle, sits up to be smacked. Williams escapes punishment, swatted to deep backward square leg

darted down the leg side, Rayudu does not connect with the flick. The keeper moves to his left but can't collect the ball on the rebound. He dives and drops the ball. Not sure if there was a scintilla of a tickle on it
quick legbreak, pushed to the off side
Cremer gives this ample air outside off, Binny comes down the track and launches it over long-on
down the track, manufactures a full toss and drills a drive to long-off
loopy and on middle, blocked back to the bowler
nips down the track and laces it to long-off
quicker through the air on middle and leg, pushed to long-on
drifting onto the hips, nudged through square leg for one
drifts in on off and then turns away past the jittery poke of Rayudu. Peach of a ball, gripped in the pitch and spun sharply
low full toss, which is driven to long-off
fired shortish, pulled away to deep backward square leg
flat and darted outside off, Rayudu stands tall and forces it to long-off
slid through on the leg stump, off the pad and sneaks away to short fine leg
tossed up on off, Rayudu steps out and quietly blocks it back to the bowler
Cremer gives this ample air outside off, Rayudu dances down the track and skewers it over the covers. Not middled
short and turning away outside off, slapped away to deep point off the back foot
flighted and on middle, inches forward and defends to leg
full and on middle, Binny laces it inside-out to long-off
on a length and on off, down the track and pushed to the covers
drifts in with the angle on middle, poked to short fine leg off an inner edge
this one spat from a length, Binny somehow defends it
wide outside off, flashed to deep cover
dropped short and on middle and leg, Rayudu goes back and mauls it over midwicket with a pull
Williams drags his length back, blocked
pushed through outside off, Rayudu stays back and blocks it to off
fuller and on middle and leg, folds low in the crease and puts it away over backward square leg with a fine sweep
legbreak outside off, punched to the off side
lobbed up and outside off, Rayudu hunts for a whoosh through the covers and ends up dragging it to long-on off an inside edge
tossed up and dips on middle, Binny tips forward and defends to leg
pitched up and on off, down the track and driven sweetly to long-off
flat and fired on middle, Rayudu keeps back and punches it down to long-on
full and outside off, square-driven to point
Rayudu races down the track, Tiripano is wary of it as he pulls his length back. Skewered over mid-on as Rayudu took his bottom hand off the bat, miscuing it
dug in short, Rayudu pulls it firmly through backward square leg, splits the two men in the deep. Looks like Rayudu is shifting grears
too full on middle and leg, flicked through midwicket
dab-and-run single to backward point. A mis-field helps India's cause
full and on off, Binny presses forward and blocks it back to the bowler
legbreak outside off, punched through the covers
looped up on off, drills a drive to deep cover
long hop on middle, Rayudu goes on the back foot and nails a pull to cow corner
pushed through with good extra bounce, Binny goes low for a sweep but misses, wearing it on his shoulder
drifting onto the leg stump, tickled to short fine leg
straight roller, defended back to the bowler
Shortish and outside off, stands tall and punches it to sweeper cover
good length and on off, run down to third man
on a length and outside off, guided to the right of deep third man. Williams limits it to just a single
back of a length and outside off, seams away, whoosh and a miss
one-bounce four. Back of a length and on a leg-stump line, Binny flits away, makes room. Picks up the slower ball and thumps it over cow corner
tossed up on middle, down the track and bunted to long-on
turning away outside off, Binny waits on the back foot and steers it to short third man
floated up on middle, down the track, does not meet the pitch of the ball and takes it on the pad
pushed through outside leg as Binny steps away and makes room. Driven down to long-off
flighted on off, Rayudu treks down the track and eases a single to long-off
slides on with the arm on middle, Binny, who was perhaps anticipating the ball to turn, adjusts and pokes it out to the off side
good length ball on off, sticks in the pitch and foils the timing. Lifted to the right of mid-off. Not off the middle of the bat
length and on off, steered to point
length again, just outside off. Binny charges down the track, extends his arms and hoists it over mid-off
good length ball around off, Binny now shuffles across off and whip-lofts it over midwicket
Panyangara pulls the pace off it wide outside off, holds up in the pitch. Binny wants to drive, he is early into the shot and gets an edge to third man
low full toss on off, driven to long-off. Binny calls for two but has to settle for one
full and sliding away outside off with the angle, dabbed to point off the face of the bat
extra bounce on this short ball outside off, beaten on the cut
good length and outside off, run down to third man
sliding away outside off with the angle on a length, glides it to deep third man, brings up the 100 partnership
picked away off the pads through backward square leg
good length and on middle, knocked towards midwicket
dug in on a shortish length and outside off, steered to third man
maiden fifty for Binny. Too full and dips in late, jabbed to the leg side
length and outside off, Rayudu smashes the screws out of it. He folds low in the crease and unleashes a power slog-sweep over midwicket

Rayudu marches to his century, he roars and punches gloves with Binny. Low full toss sliding onto the legs, he twirls his wrists and picks it in the gap to the cow-corner boundary, splits the two men in the deep
full and wide outside off, sliced to deep cover
slower full toss on off, nudged to the leg side
dug in on a shortish length and outside off, slapped through the covers
short and wide outside off again, tagged with lots of width. Binny flashes a cut, up and over backward point
pitched up and on middle, lashed to point for a quick single
wide yorker outside off, jabbed down to long-off
nice, juicy full toss outside off as the yorker goes wrong. Binny sits back in the crease and socks it over the covers, races away
hurled full and on middle and leg, punched down to long-on
yorker at the base of off, Binny jams his bat down and squirts it to the left of the keeper off an inside edge
full and wide outside off, Binny throws his bat at it and swings it over cover-point after making room
Panyangara hunts for a yorker, pushes it too full. The low full-toss is flicked to deep midwicket
yorker, right in the blockhole, jammed out to the off side

low full toss outside off, Rayudu shuffles across off and mis-controls a slog sweep over backward square. Chibhabha runs back and throws himself onto the ground but the ball evades him. Perhaps, he was put off by the man running in from the deep
yorker around off, Rayudu looks to slog, secures a single off a leg bye
pitched up and on off, Rayudu gets under it and lofts it, rather slices it in front of an on-rushing long-off fielder. This was hit flat in front of Sibanda
Vitori spears a yorker outside off, Binny can't dig it out
Binny goes Boom. Low full toss on off, Binny goes low with it and smashes a slog-sweep, sending it soaring over long-on. He wears a big smile on his face. He enjoyed that
Binny flits around in the crease, Vitori nails a yorker at the base of off, jabbed to the covers
length and on middle, powered to long-off
Binny goes Boom again! Vitori does not get hold of the yorker, serves up a full toss, which is clubbed, bisecting deep midwicket and long-on
full and outside off, down the track and drilled over the head of the bowler. Superb connection from Rayudu
back of a length and outside off, flat-batted to a deepish mid-off
full and wide outside off from round the stumps, swing and a miss
good length and outside off, nice knee bend as Binny scythes it over the covers
low full toss outside off, Binny loads up and wants to crash it away. He only mis-hits it in the air, drops into no-man's land in front of an on-rushing Raza from long-off

Binny swings and edges it behind. Pushed full and wide outside off, Tiripano rolls his fingers across this cutter. Binny's balance is a mess as he looks to kitchen-sink it away. He can only manage an outside edge to Mutumbami. End of a rapid stand, the highest sixth-wicket stand for India
slower, short ball, check-punched back to the bowler
yorker outside off, dug out to the off side
hurled full and outside off, jabbed over a leaping bowler. Only a single
full toss and dispatched. Rayudu loads up and thumps it over the covers for his highest ODI score
right in the blockhole on middle, jabbed to the covers

Mutumbami hits the stumps at the strikers' but Rayudu is in. Low full toss on the leg stump, Axar slogs and only gets an inside edge onto the pad, which dribbles behind to the keeper. Rayudu immediately sets off.
Rayudu slinks away outside off, misses the slog-sweep against this length ball

inn2.comm: back of a length and on off, gets right behind the line and blocks it resolutely to the covers
good length and on off with some outswing, poked out towards backward point
good length and on off, defended neatly to the off side
back of a length and hurries on off, leans back and chops it square on the off side between the two fielders
much fuller and just a shade outside off, ignored
fractionally short and swinging away, defended towards point
full and shapes away outside off, left alone. The ball dies in front of Uthappa, he endures an unkind second bounce and lets it slip through his legs
good length and curls away, blocked to the covers
back of a length and on off, camps back and clips it to the right of mid-on
back of a length, hits the seam and moves away outside off. He thought about having a nibble at it before leaving it
Kulkarni strays onto the pads, Sibanda picks it up and flicks it beautifully over midwicket. So beautiful that it should be danced to at weddings
back of a length and on off, Sibanda hangs on the back foot and blocks it to the leg side
dug in short and on a fourth-stump line, Chibhabha gets right behind that in defence
back of a length and on off, back and across as Chibhabha turns it to the right of mid-on
good length and swings away outside off, left alone belatedly
back of a length and holds its line outside off, no shot offered
good length and just a shade outside off, ignored again
tight line on off, defended to the covers
back of a length, top-of-off line, Kulkarni pushes the batsman on the back foot. Blocked back
curls away outside off on a length, snatches the outside edge, runs away to deep third man
fullish and on off, Sibanda comes forward and taps it to the covers
bumper slid down the leg side, Sibanda hunkers down and lets it go. Loads of height on it, wide
good length and on off, inches forward and dabs it towards point
picked away off the pads behind square for a couple of runs
pitched up and right in the channel, left alone
on a length and outside off with a hint of extra bounce, Chibhabha shoulders arms
fuller and on off, straight-bat push to mid-off
lifter outside off, he thought about having a crack at it before aborting the shot and leaving
fullish and on off, blocked to mid-off

outswinger with loads of extra extra bounce nabs Chibhabha. He is crease-bound as he spars at it and gets a thickish outside edge, which flies to Rahane at second slip. Good, sharp catch around head height
tails back in and strikes him on the thigh pad
full and wide outside off, Sibanda reaches out and slices it to the right of deep third man off the outer half of the bat
good length and on off, Hami M comes forward and blocks it calmly
length and on off, forward and blocked in front of mid-off
bumpy ball down leg as Kulkarni gets his radar wrong. Wide called
draws Hami M forward with a good length ball, which is blocked back to the bowler
drifting onto the pads, glanced through backward square leg
pitched further up and nips away outside off,  Sibanda lets it pass
pitched up and outside off, Hami M strides forward, covers his off stump and lets it pass
back of a length, Bhuvneshwar rolled his fingers across it. Hami M looks to punch and manages an inside edge onto the pad, dribbles behind, towards the keeper
away-going ball outside off, left alone
banged in short and outside off, does not rise much. But  Sibanda respects it and ducks under
edged and drops short of first slip. He comes down the track, Bhuvneshwar pulls his length back, gets it to swing away outside off. Catches the outside edge but it does not carry
fullish teaser outside off, Sibanda nearly nicks it off
fullish and outside off, no shot offered
good length and on off, forward and defended
bouncer down leg, Hami M hunts for a hook and misses
back of a length and just a shade outside off, punched to mid-off
very, very wristy! Fractionally short and on off, Hami M twirls his wrists on the back foot and flicks it to the left of mid-on
good length and on a fourth-stump line, pushed to the covers
fuller and on off, defended off the front foot
back of a length and on middle, whisked to the right of Harbhajan at mid-on
pitched up and outside off, crisp drive to mid-off
good length and hurries on middle and leg, punched to midwicket
gentle outswinger outside off,  Hami M lets it pass
length and outside off, slashed straight to point
back of a length and outside off, ignored
back of a length and drifting down leg, off the thigh pad to the left of Jadhav Uthappa
pitched up and shapes away late outside off, Hami M watches it through to the keeper
Hami M reaps reward for intent. He slithers away outside leg, Binny follows him. Lustily clubbed over vacant midwicket
disciplined line and length. Good length and on off, blocked
on a length and on off, Hami M brings his wrists into play, picks it up and gives it marching orders to the cow-corner boundary
back of a length and outside off, pushed to the covers off the back foot
pitched up in the channel, Sibanda does not bother with it
full and outside off, down the track, big whoosh and a miss
rare error from Bhuvneshwar, drifting onto the pads. Whipped with the wrists over midwicket. First boundary off Bhuvneshwar
Bhuvneshwar retorts with a bouncer, ducked under. He has a wry smile on his face
bumper down leg,  Sibanda slips under it. Wide called
back of a length and outside off, down the track and punched to the off side
tossed up offbreak, nudged to square leg
pushed through on middle, shapes for a lap sweep but is beaten by extra bounce, so is Uthappa
good-length ball, defended
fuller and on middle, he sinks to one knee and succeeds in lap-sweeping it to long leg
quicker on off, goes back and punches it back to the bowler
flatter and on off, he Hami M hangs back and punches it to the right of the bowler
cracker of a shot. Good length ball, Sibanda runs down the track and launches it over long-on for a clean, flat six
Binny strikes back! Dragged short, not much bite in it. It should have been put away, instead Sibanda mis-hits the pull. Harbhajan swallows it at mid-on. Good overhead catch
good length, keeps low outside off. Pushed to point, there is a brief indecision between the wickets but the fielder fails to effect a direct hit at the strikers'
good length, camps back and turns it in front of mid-on
full and outside off, pushed to mid-off
Hami M stays back to a shortish ball outside off and punches it to deep third man via the face of the bat
sliding down leg, Hami M misses the flick, wide called
drifting down leg again, loops to leg-slip off the thigh pad
flighted on off, nudged to short midwicket
slid through on middle, blocked to the leg side off the back foot
loopier on off, strides forward to defend and takes it on the pad
flatter and outside off, Hami M punchily defends it back to the bowler
leg-stump ball, which is tickled to the left of leg-slip
fuller and outside off, drilled away. Vijay dives to his right at short cover and makes a smart stop
shortish and on off, Hami M stands tall as he punches it back to Binny
picked away off the pads through midwicket. There is protection in the deep
veering down leg, helped on its way, fine on the leg side. All Chigumbura had to do was to give it direction
much better. Tight line on off, blocked back to the bowler
overpitched on the stumps, drills a drive to mid-on. Harbhajan dives to his left and makes an impressive save. There is a communication breakdown between the wickets but no harm done
Tripe ball. Half-tracker and banished over the square leg umpire with a powerful pull
darted quicker, pushed back to the bowler, who flings to his right and stops the ball. He is not shy of throwing himself on the ground
nudged to the right of short midwicket
Harbhajan held this one back as the batsman dances down the track. Quietly defended
straight roller, pushed back to the bowler
flat length ball on middle, tucked off the back foot past square leg
pushed through on middle, blocked back to the bowler
slides on with the arm on off, punchily defended to the covers
fuller and outside off, drilled down to long-off
darted flat and outside off, hangs back and punches it through the covers
slides on again, pings Chigumbura on the thigh
full and on middle, pushed back to the bowler
slower through the air on middle, glanced to the left of leg-slip
fired flat on middle, nudged through backward square leg
tossed up on off, comes forward and defends it
good length offbreak, blocked to leg
Hami M wants to power this flat ball away, but ends up mis-hitting it back to the bowler
fired outside off, Chigumbura aims for a cut, gets a healthy edge past the lone slip fielder
back of a length and outside off, slapped to deep cover
pitched up and on off, driven to the covers off the front foot
pushed to the covers
drifts in on off, fluid drive to long-off

Axar hurls it flat and wide outside off, Hami M looks to cut and misses. Uthappa can't pouch it. But I guess there was no deflection there. Oh wait, replays suggest that there was a clear nick there. Uthappa aimed to take it on the rebound but put it down
fuller and on middle, down the track and clipped to long-on
fullish and on off, steps out and works it to midwicket
tossed up and on middle, chipped in front of midwicket
swept from outside off to the leg side
tucked around the corner
full and on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
flat ball, pushed back to the bowler
hangs back and punches it through the covers
chopped away to deep cover
back of a length and outside off, stands tall and punches it to short cover
fired on off, pushed to short cover
slower through the air and outside off, hit to deep cover
spins in on off, blocked back to the bowler
slower through the air on off, folds low in the crease and paddles to long leg
lobbed up on middle, down the track, beaten in flight. Poked wide of leg-slip. Harbhajan did well to shorten his length
Hami M hangs back and punches this to long-on
flat ball, with some overspin. Chigumbura leans back and middles a cut through cover-point
down the track, meets the pitch of the ball and punches it to long-on
full and on middle, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up, tapped to short cover. Chigumbura keen for the single but is sent back
pushed through outside off, leans back and slaps it to deep point
Axar gives this more air on off, driven back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, cut to backward point

Hami M falls. Alarming turn and bounce. Might have held up in the pitch as well. Hami M was surprised by it as he just chips it tamely to Tiwary at point off the outside half of the bat. Hami M yanked his bottom hand off the bat as he met the ball
good length and just a shade outside off, blocked from the crease
good length ball, defended
attempted bouncer down leg, does not rise much as Chigumbura sinks under it. Wide
back of a length and outside off, mis-hit to short cover
full and wide outside off, Chigumbura looks to force it through the off side. He ends up toe-ending it wide of backward point to the right of deep third man
pitched up and on off, driven to long-off
full and outside off, driven past the covers
straight and just outside off, pushed back to the bowler
Axar takes out Williams for a duck. He gives this more air outside off, grips in the surface and rips through the bat-pad gap to hit the top of middle and off. Zimbabwe fall behind in the chase
big appeal for lbw, pushed through and Axar gets turn to hit him on the front pad. Sliding down
pushed through outside off, tapped to the covers
darted outside off, left alone
straight roller on middle, Raza gets forward to defend it. End of a maiden-wicket over
darted flat on a leg-stump line, mistimed pull to short fine leg
legbreak outside off, he goes for a cut and bottom-edges it to the right of Uthappa
rank long hop on off, Raza makes it look even worse as he rocks back and tonks a pull over midwicket even as his head fell over
dug in short and outside off, forced through the covers and Zimbabwe move into three figures
another short ball, Tiwary escapes punishment as it it pulled straight to square leg
loopier and on middle, pushed to mid-off. Diving save from Rahane
fullish and on middle and leg, paddled fine on the leg side, beats the man in the deep
and againn! Straight ball on middle, Raza gets into position quickly and lap-sweeps it fine of fine leg
on a length and on off, down the track and poked to point as Axar had pulled his length back
rising outside off with extra bounce, defended

pitched up and just a shade outside off, Raza drives it past the covers. There is a communication breakdown on the third run as they decide against it rather belatedly. Raza dives and makes his ground at the non-strikers' end by the time Axar takes the bails off
full and outside off, driven to deep cover
fullish and outside off, Raza opens the face and runs it down to deep third man
fuller length ball, blocked
short and wide outside off, cut firmly to deep point
shortish ball on middle, Raza rises with it as he tucks it around the corner for one
too full and straight, clipped to midwicket
good length and on off, looks to flick it to leg from the crease and squirts it to third man off a leading edge
driven to the covers
driven past the diving cover fielder to long-off
straying onto the pads, swept to deep backward square leg
Chigumbura secures a single to long-on
fullish and on middle, dances down the track and misses. Struck on the pads
darted on the thigh, they jog across for a leg bye as Raza misses the flick
back of a length and on middle, tucked to midwicket
good length, blocked on off stump
low full toss, picked away to the leg side
full and on off, Chigumbura wants to drive it through the covers but drags the slower ball to leg off the inside half of the bat
tucked off the pads through midwicket
Binny slips in another slower ball, Chigumbura can't manufacture his own pace. Blocked to leg
flighted and outside off, Raza bends forward and blocks it onto the pitch
fuller and on off with overspin, Raza goes for a lap-sweep and gloves it fine to the left of Uthappa
looped up on off, defended to the covers
swept away through backward square leg
dug in short and on a leg-stump line, swept to deep backward square leg again
tossed up and turns in with some extra bounce. Raza takes it on his glove
back of a length and on off, he hangs back and drops it in front of the covers
similar length and line, punched through the covers
glanced wide of short fine leg
width on offer outside off with some extra bounce, stroked through the covers
pitched up and on off, mis-hit drive to long-on, off the inside half of the bat
flicked off the pads through backward square leg. Rayudu tidies up in the deep
floaty and dips on off, Raza  steps out and defends it
Raza creates some room and cuts this flat ball in front of point. Binny gives the chase, slides and hauls the ball back in. But it's an all-run four
skids on after pitching, jabbed to the leg side
bisects the two men in the deep with surgical precision. It was a poor ball, though. Harbhajan drags it down, he ventures deep in the crease and pulls it to the cow-corner boundary

another half-tracker, Raza goes for a pull and gifts his wicket. He makes a mess of the pull as he mistimes it in the air. Axar runs in from deep midwicket, flings himself forward and snaps it up. First ODI wicket for Harbhajan in four years
flat and fired on off, keeps the batsman in the crease. Blunted to the leg side
tight line on off, dropped in front of short cover
fullish and outside off, poked to third man off an outside edge
full and on off, blocked to leg
too full and straight, gets an inside edge onto the pad
pitched up and outside off, Mutumbami throws his bat at a drive and hits it through the covers
spins in on off, blocked onto the pitch
flighted and on off, defended to leg side off an inside edge
Harbhajan pushes it through, blocked
back of a length and outside off, Mutumbami goes on the back foot and flays it past the covers
slides on middle and leg, knocked defensively in front of midwicket
tucked to the right of short midwicket. Mutumbai wants a single but no dice
veering onto the pads, glanced away to short fine leg, where the fielder dives, fumbles and gives away a four
shortish and on off, bunted to the leg side
back of a length and on off, punched to the off side
shortish and on off, defended to short cover
back of a length and outside off, jabbed to point
back of a length and outside off, punched to the covers
offbreak on off, Mutumbami goes on the back foot as he pushes it to the covers
flatter and outside off, lashed away to deep point
flighted and turns in, worked to short fine leg
looped up around off, patted to short cover
kicks up outside off with some overspin, diffused onto the pitch
pushed through on middle, chipped in front of midwicket
full and just a shade outside off, pushed to point
full and on the stumps, driven between the non-striker and bowler. Might have been the change of pace
good length and on off, knocked to midwicket off the front foot

Binny rolls his fingers across this one. Mutumbai targets the leg side with a flick but ends up spooning a leading edge to Harbhajan at mid-off. He runs to his right and takes it. They check for a possible no-ball. Binny is okay
pitched up and on the stumps, drilled drive to long-on. Chigumbura gets to a fifty and raises his bat to acknowledge the cheers
fullish and on off, pushed wide of the covers
fractionally short on off, dabbed to point
short and wide outside off, slashed to point
similar line and length, Cremer seeks to cut and manages an bottom edge to Uthappa
good length and around off, gets an inside edge onto the pad, which dribbles in front of point. Cremer looks for a quick one but is sent back
back of a length and outside off, jabbed to short cover and they set off. A direct hit from Rahane could have consumed Chigumbura, who had almost given up
back of a length and outside off, this does not bounce. Chigumbura cuts and misses. Uthappa is beaten too as the ball sneaks away for four byes
fullish and outside off, Cremer throws his bat at a drive and sends it clattering through the covers
good length ball on off, Cremer tips forward and knocks it to midwicket
fullish and tails in a bit, inside-edges it onto the pad
looks like a slower ball outside off, tapped to point
nudged off the pads to short fine leg
a touch overpitched on the stumps, slams a drive between the bowler and non-striker to long-on
darted short and on middle and leg, pulled away through backward square leg. Vijay makes a mess of it in the deep
pushed through outside off, slapped through the off side
tossed up, looks for a lap sweep and misses. Takes it on the thigh
punched to the covers. Chigumbura wants a single but is sent back
slides on, tucked to leg
pitched up and outside off, lashed to deep cover
pitched up and outside off, Chigumbura drives and gets beaten
back of a length and on middle, tucked away to deep midwicket. Jadhav misfields and gifts another run
fuller and on off, played to the leg side off an inside edge. The pair come back for the second
veering onto the pads, picked up over backward square leg
strays on the pads again, flicked to deep backward square leg
pitched up and on a fourth-stump line, worked to the right of midwicket
slides on with the arm outside off, Cremer cuts and misses
pushed through on off, he takes it on the pad as he misses the drive
flat and fired outside off, he can't connect with the cut again
a big appeal for lbw. Pushed through on middle, strikes him on the front pad. That looks out to me but umpire Tiffin disagrees
tossed up, down the track and pushed to off
fuller and on middle and leg, Cremer goes low and sweeps it around the corner
back of a length and straight in line, clipped through backward square leg
bumper down leg, wide
shortish and on middle and leg, glanced to fine leg for a couple
full on the stumps, driven to mid-on
Kulkarni sucks pace off this one outside off, Cremer nearly chipped it back to the bowler
on a length and outside off, slapped to Rahane at covers
lifter outside off, gets big on Chigu. Another wide
Kulkarni slips in a shortish cutter, Chigumbura sizes it up and whacks it over cow corner. Drilled flat and hard. Kulkarni plays the penalty for the wide
darted on a leg-stump line, dribbles in front of square leg off an inside edge
fuller and outside off, thumped to long-off
flatter and fired outside off, Chigumbura goes for a flashy drive and misses
Axar pulls his length back, punched to the off side
pushed through on middle, Cremer goes for a sweep and misses. Takes it on the pad
Cremer comes down the track, Axar drags his length back and smacks him on the pad
Bhuvneshwar errs short and wide outside off, Chigumbura bashes it square on the off side, scoots away to the boundary. Rasping cut, some shot that!
low full toss on off, pushed to Rahane at the covers. That should have been dispatched
Bhuvi nails a yorker just a shade outside off, Chigumbura can't squeeze it out. He was late to bring his bat down
slower full ball on off, sliced to point
shortish and on off, flat-batted back to the bowler. But not much power behind it
Cremer steps away outside leg, Bhuvneshwar fires a yorker on middle, jammed out to leg
Kulkarni takes a leaf from Bhuvi's playbook and fires a yorker outside off. Chigumbura makes room but can't squirt it out

Kulkarni misses the yorker, errs too full and outside off. Chigumbura bends his knee and cracks it hard through the covers. Rayudu runs to his right from sweeper but is beaten. The Zimbabwe crowd lapping all this up...
yorker just outside off, drilled down the ground to long-on for a couple of runs
pitched up and outside off, Chigumbura flays it wide of long-off
slides it down leg from round the stumps, wide called
good-length slower ball outside off, sliced over the covers. Chigumbura races back for the second
shortish and drifting down leg, helped to deep backward square leg with a pull
full toss on middle and leg, clipped to long-on for a single
Bhuvneshwar hunts for a yorker but ends up bowling a full toss. Chigumbura sits back in the crease and smashes it to the left of long-on, one-bounce four
another low full toss, picked away off the toes and whipped to deep midwicket
Bhuvneshwar turns to the slower ball outside off, dragged to long-on. Vijay runs to his left, dives forward but drops it
another full toss, Chigumbura misses out. Tucked away to leg for only one
Cremer brings out the scoop, a la Dougie Marillier. Full and on middle and leg, he scoops it away fine on the leg side, leaving the ball boy breaking into a catchy little jig as he collects the ball
short and on a leg-stump line, cramping Chigumbura for room. Helped to long leg with a pull
Kulkarni pushes it too full and on middle, Creamer makes room and drills a drive to long-off
sliding down leg, he can't connect with a flick. Wide called

veering onto the pads, nudged to the leg side off an inside edge. Chigumbura gets to a century, back-to-back hundreds. He eases the helmet off his head, punches the air in delight and celebrates. WHADDA innings. Harare jiving with their captain...
short of a length and outside off, Cremer pulls it to wide long-on off the front foot. Tiwary is not quick enough and they take two
full toss on a leg-stump line, pushed to long-on. They hare across for a couple

What have you done Cremer? Full toss outside the leg stump, he goes for a reverse-sweep and hits it right into the lap of  Binny at backward point. The wide has helped him get the wicket, but India needed Chigumbura's wicket
right in the blockhole on middle, clipped to long-on Chigumbura races across for the second
nails a yorker, just outside off. Makes room and drills it forcefully to deep cover
yorker on a leg-stump line, flicked to long leg
Bhuvneshwar serves up a full toss outside off, skewered to long-off on the bounce. Chigumbura refuses a single
low full toss outside off, flashes a drive straight to Rahane at the covers
India edge Zimbabwe. Bhuvi hurls a yorker on a leg-stump line, down the track and driven to long-on. Chigumbura can't do a Miandad..
